9af2c8a9-6491-4df1-95a1-9ec4ea36edc4.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
9af2c8a9-6491-4df1-95a1-9ec4ea36edc4.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

996682c0-4dd8-4ed6-a0fb-698a461be851.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
996682c0-4dd8-4ed6-a0fb-698a461be851.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

e260e547-3bd4-4c6a-ac53-9cd2e3a5164f.name: Chummy
e260e547-3bd4-4c6a-ac53-9cd2e3a5164f.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

16647ea6-9f5e-4d7f-8966-0f130c23930d.name: Chummy (Gregarious)
16647ea6-9f5e-4d7f-8966-0f130c23930d.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

f1e14d9f-3ec7-46a5-9d37-ff7bd60a2f21.name: Experienced
f1e14d9f-3ec7-46a5-9d37-ff7bd60a2f21.notes: Spend additional 10 points on advantages or to add or improve any primary skills

73fb6ae1-f4d3-4667-ac0b-f9dac7c5510d.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
